Sentencas: In order to optimize the energy utilization of an air conditioning system, a tri-generation system has been introduced.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a tri-generation water-cooled air conditioning system

Sentencas: Energy in the form of heat is inserted to the prime mover of the system, and the total cooling demand of the building would be produced by utilizing a compression and an absorption water-cooled chiller.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a tri-generation water-cooled air conditioning system

Sentencas: The prime mover can either be a micro-gas turbine (MGT), a gas turbine (CT), or a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a tri-generation water-cooled air conditioning system

Sentencas: All the system components, such as the absorption chiller and the cooling tower have been modeled and analyzed through the energy and exergy approaches.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a tri-generation water-cooled air conditioning system

Sentencas: Performance parameters of the system, such as energy utilization factor and second law efficiency, have been calculated in different operating conditions.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a tri-generation water-cooled air conditioning system

Sentencas: The results would reveal the best operating conditions of the system and the most critical components would be highlighted.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a tri-generation water-cooled air conditioning system
